column1: Renaissance High School for Musical Theater & Technology
column2: ['My experience at Renaissance High School for Musical Theater and The Arts has been absolutely wonderful. The staff is amazing always making sure your okay. Coming in as a freshman they make sure you adapt to the transition from middle school to high school with a organization called PGC, where juniors and seniors mentor freshman and help them adapt and teach them life lessons. All together the school is one big community we never really have any problems with one another which is great', 'I love the diversity of my school.The teachers are great and take time to get you to understand your classwork. I wish my school had SAT prep, life skills classes, CPR training', 'I have attended Renaissance High School for Musical Theatre & Technology for almost 3 years now. I have dealth with some personal issues when I first attended Renaissance. They have given me the opportunity to graduate on time with giving me the classes and the tutoring I needed. The negative side is there is some safety issues in the school, alot of fighting. Class sizes are extremely large.', 'The way the teachers push you and motivate you to do better is amazing. They offer tutoring at least twice a week and will never put you down if they feel like you need more assistance on a topic. Great experience.', 'I like the fact that it is small school so we were able to build a strong community amongst ourselves. The administration and teachers do everything in their power to make sure their students are able to succeed.', 'Renaissance High School is such a great school, there sometimes can be up to 4 teachers in one class. The teachers want you to actually succeed and make something of yourself, the trips were amazing and the events/clubs are very diverse.', 'My experience in Renaissance was a good experience for the most part. In the beginning it was going pretty good, but more into the school year there was a lot of problems.', 'I loved my time at Renaissance High School because the teachers and students were always involved with each other. Also, the teachers never gave up on any student and always wanted to make sure we were ready for college after high school. ', "I haven't been in too many clubs due to a lack of those I would be interested in.", "Even though I have had a few problems during my time at this school, the environment is exactly what I would want to have in a high school, and for that reason, if no other, I'm glad I chose this school to attend.", "Regarding the teachers I've had in the past three years, the majority have been very knowledgeable and helpful both during classes and when I've needed extra help.", "It's better than most schools in the Bronx, the students are average but the education is good", 'The safety policies are very good along with health programs', 'Dance club alone with student government is very cool.', 'I love dance class and advisor with Dean Conrow', 'The teachers are very helpful and go out of their way to help the students achieve academic goals.', 'There is great diversity among the choices to accommodate to the likings of different types of students.', 'I have acquired many meaningful skills at this school.', 'The teachers are engaged and attempt to incorporate fun activities into the lessons.', "I'm not really sure about the activities that they offer after school because i didn't partcpiate in any but i know it's a wide variety of them"]

Also, the teachers never gave up on any student and always wanted to make sure we were ready for college after high school. ', "I haven't been in too many clubs due to a lack of those I would be interested in.", "Even though I have had a few problems during my time at this school, the environment is exactly what I would want to have in a high school, and for that reason, if no other, I'm glad I chose this school to attend.", "Regarding the teachers I've had in the past three years, the majority have been very knowledgeable and helpful both during classes and when I've needed extra help.", "It's better than most schools in the Bronx, the students are average but the education is good", 'The safety policies are very good along with health programs', 'Dance club alone with student government is very cool.', 'I love dance class and advisor with Dean Conrow', 'The teachers are very helpful and go out of their way to help the students achieve academic goals.', 'There is great diversity among the choices to accommodate to the likings of different types of students.', 'I have acquired many meaningful skills at this school.', 'The teachers are engaged and attempt to incorporate fun activities into the lessons.', "I'm not really sure about the activities that they offer after school because i didn't partcpiate in any but i know it's a wide variety of them"]
column6: ['My experience at Renaissance High School for Musical Theater and The Arts has been absolutely wonderful. The staff is amazing always making sure your okay. Coming in as a freshman they make sure you adapt to the transition from middle school to high school with a organization called PGC, where juniors and seniors mentor freshman and help them adapt and teach them life lessons. All together the school is one big community we never really have any problems with one another which is great', 'I love the diversity of my school.The teachers are great and take time to get you to understand your classwork. I wish my school had SAT prep, life skills classes, CPR training', 'I have attended Renaissance High School for Musical Theatre & Technology for almost 3 years now. I have dealth with some personal issues when I first attended Renaissance. They have given me the opportunity to graduate on time with giving me the classes and the tutoring I needed. The negative side is there is some safety issues in the school, alot of fighting. Class sizes are extremely large.', 'The way the teachers push you and motivate you to do better is amazing. They offer tutoring at least twice a week and will never put you down if they feel like you need more assistance on a topic. Great experience.', 'I like the fact that it is small school so we were able to build a strong community amongst ourselves. The administration and teachers do everything in their power to make sure their students are able to succeed.', 'Renaissance High School is such a great school, there sometimes can be up to 4 teachers in one class. The teachers want you to actually succeed and make something of yourself, the trips were amazing and the events/clubs are very diverse.', 'My experience in Renaissance was a good experience for the most part. In the beginning it was going pretty good, but more into the school year there was a lot of problems.', 'I loved my time at Renaissance High School because the teachers and students were always involved with each other. Also, the teachers never gave up on any student and always wanted to make sure we were ready for college after high school. ', "I haven't been in too many clubs due to a lack of those I would be interested in.", "Even though I have had a few problems during my time at this school, the environment is exactly what I would want to have in a high school, and for that reason, if no other, I'm glad I chose this school to attend.", "Regarding the teachers I've had in the past three years, the majority have been very knowledgeable and helpful both during classes and when I've needed extra help.", "It's better than most schools in the Bronx, the students are average but the education is good", 'The safety policies are very good along with health programs', 'Dance club alone with student government is very cool.', 'I love dance class and advisor with Dean Conrow', 'The teachers are very helpful and go out of their way to help the students achieve academic goals.', 'There is great diversity among the choices to accommodate to the likings of different types of students.', 'I have acquired many meaningful skills at this school.', 'The teachers are engaged and attempt to incorporate fun activities into the lessons.', "I'm not really sure about the activities that they offer after school because i didn't partcpiate in any but i know it's a wide variety of them"]
column8: ['The teachers always encourage students to join multiple after school groups to broaden their horizons.', "The facilities aren't very high quality and clean, although they get the job done.", "One of my favorite experiences at Renaissance High School has been the performances I've done in the dance department for the Winter and Spring Music Concerts. This school is unique because there is a wide range of students at the school and very caring teachers. I would choose this school over again because it has made me become a very responsible young woman. I also met so many interesting people in the school and made a friend that I will cherish forever. ", 'I think the teachers really do try their best to make sure all students understand what is being taught. Many teachers are young and new, therefore are able to relate to the students. And the teachers that are a bit older have more experience and are familiar with how students act.', 'The school has a very effective administration policy. Staff tries their best to make sure students are in appropriate dress code and do not bullying or discriminate against others. They try their best to regulate attendance, but many students have spotty attendance regardless. ', 'I believe the school tries there hardest to have as many teachers teaching different classes. Scheduling however, is very sloppy each year. ', 'There are many different extracurricular activities, but not a lot of kids participate.', "The food is rather healthy, but there isn't a huge variety, which forces kids to buy snacks for lunch. The cafeteria is okay, but sometimes roaches do appear. The cost of food is okay. ", 'The sports and fitness opportunities at this school are okay. It would be amazing if the gym areas and locker rooms were cleaner. It would also be nice if the school had a swimming pool. ', "I think the school is rather safe, but I believe a problem with someone in your school will definitely follow you when the school day is over. I've most definitely see this occur multiple times regarding fighting and gang violence. ", 'The school has some options but not that many, on the up side they sell fruit salads for $2.00', 'The teachers are great, well some. Most are very friendly and helpful; my favorites are Mr. Savio and Ms. Berger', 'This uses technology as a tool, we have smart boards and lap tops, some online coarses. The schedules could be a little weird and make no sense, maybe the guidance councler will help you', "There aren't really many restrictions, you just can't show your stomache, butt, or chest; and you can't have short shorts. There really isn't that much of a bullying policy, though bullying really isn't that much of a problem; I'm not saying it doesn't happen, just not that much", "when I first came to this school, the guidance councler started me out in lunch and I was so scared. But I just sat at a table and introduced myself and the two girls at the table were friendly and weren't rude to me though a little aloof because they didn't know me. Over time as I got comfortable with the school I made so many close friends and most of them don't really hang out in the same group of friends as eachother", "I've been to many schools but this school was the only school that ever made me feel at home because it's so small", "We have updated Mac Computers in the Computer lab and students can go there during lunch, if that's not available there is usually a teacher depending on your teacher/student relationship that doesn't mind lending you their lap tops. As for tutoring, there's always tutoring available especially on Saturdays, all you need to do is ask", "I have no doubt that we areprotected, we have plenty of security and metal detectors though the security guards could get really annoying; it depends on which one you get. As for nurses, since our school is so small we don't have nurses; if we get hurt we must go to the Main Office to get a pass to the Nurse for Lehman tough they sometimes won't take you unless you're a member of the clinic", 'There are a variety of clubs, I myself am part of Musical Theatre and Art club. But they also have the Green Team which work hard to save the planet, BAM which helps teach boys how to grow in to respectful men and Women of Tomorrow which supports the future women of Rennasaince High, etc', 'I believe our strongest activity is Musical theater. There is allot of work that goes to this activity and it is very well known for. Other activities are Mouse Squad, Step team, BAM, WOT, Art club, and robotics. We are also stepping it up in the arts, where we will have both regular and advanced classes in dance and acting.']

column1: New Visions Charter High School - Adv. Math/Science IV
column2: ['Every school has their pros and their cons. However, at this school I enjoyed mostly everything. My favorite thing at this school is the staff. The staff are there to help you achieve any and every goal.They are 100% behind you every step of the way. They have supported me through my toughest times and without most of the staff there I feel as if I would not be where I am.', "There is a lack of oppurtunites and programs that a student can thrive in. For instance there isn't all the sports teams like soccer, tennis, hockey, swim, bowling, lacrosse, and more.  The school doesn't prepare you for important exams like SAT, ACT, and more. You have to study for yourself.", 'What I likes about my high school year during my time is AMSIV is teacher really push you to strive and achieve. They always have fun actives so we can enjoy our school year.', "I like the School's location, diversity and academics. The teachers are good and show some level of interest in the students progress. Sports is not very good as I was looking forward to playing soccer in High school but could not because the school does not have a Soccer team. School administration is very good at providing updates to parents regarding incidents that happened at school campus and my parents are always praising the school for providing updates. New visions charter High School needs to increase on their curriculum and include more field trips, sight seeing and travel programs that will help to expose and educate students on new experiences.", 'In my experience at new Visions, it was a very great school . This school supported us in many different ways. I would change the fact that they should’ve made us take classes in preparation of college.', 'The school is very inconsistent. Administration  is not really involved in the students they only prepare for the seniors while students in other grades are lacking. They also fail to explain to students about the college process and also fail to make students aware of SAT dates and it’s importance. Thet are only involved in seniors don’t make students aware of the importance of their freshman year and their remaining four years towards colleges they end up having to find out themselves.', 'The education and atmosphere at this High School is over the top fantastic! AMS IV makes sure their school is always on top with education and activities. They offer many different opportunity for scholars to do many different things throughout the school year that fits them. Spectacular school to enroll your teen in for academics and to live like a real high school student.', 'My school provided me with a second chance at a better future. Before coming to high school, I had no sense of direction. Being a freshman with no future plans always was something that constantly worried me. However, over the years I became engaged within my school community and now I am able to say I am graduating with a 3.5 GPA, in National Honor Society and I have over 8 college acceptances.', "In New Visions I experienced a  multi- cultural environment. When I first started out I was a shy and reserved person, but with the help of my peers and administrators I've started to become better.In this high school I had teachers and students to push me and encourage me to do great in my academics and life.", 'The social environment is eligible for improvement, but overall, AMS IV has a wonderful experience for me so far and I look forward to  being apart of the graduating class of 2020. #2020Vision!', 'I am going to be the first graduating class and I have been getting prepared for the real world. The curriculum is rigorous and I think it allows students to understand how challenging life is going to be.']

['I love the school, it was an honor to be able to attend Brick-Township-HS. The staff clearly cared about keeping the high school clean and safe, while also keeping it as a fun environment.', "My experience at Brick Township High School has been an enjoyable one. Of course every school has their perfections and flaws, but what makes Brick different from anywhere else is the support from the teachers, administrators, and staff. We may not be the wealthiest school around, but it's whats on the inside that matters. Behind every student is an encouraging staff member, whether it's a coach, teacher, guidance counselor, or even janitor.  My sophomore year history teacher, who is now retired, was the most influential person I have ever met. He would not only teach us not only about the history of our country, but lessons I will carry with me for the rest of my life. He told us stories about him meeting his wife and knowing that she was the one, he reenacted the Battle of Bull Run with a ruler and screamed running out of the classroom pretending it was a bayonet, and make jokes to help us remember our lesson. He truly changed my high school experience into a positive one.", 'BTHS isn’t a bad school, but it’s nothing amazing. Most of the teachers are very good at what they do with the exception of only a handful. One downside is that the school is very biased when it comes to activities.', "The teachers Really don't care that much. The classes are not challenging at all. The school is very very dirty. There have been many times that I have been walking the halls and witnessed a mouse or rat run across the floor. The safety of this school is not good either. The school really needs to get their stuff together they are only worried about our football program.", 'Good teachers. I had a very good experience over all and had no problem with the actually school itself. Only problem was sometimes the technology did not work.', 'I like that Brick Township High School is very diverse. Most of the teachers there also are very connected to the children and care for the future of the children. The clubs are good and very diverse. The school is very concerned about only football, I think it should care about the other sports as well.', 'In all honesty, I love BTHS. Many students do not like because it is "old and dirty". Although these things are pretty true, I really enjoy BTHS for its clubs, sports, and overall education. I have learned so much from this school and have found the coursework to be challenging. Overall, if you get involved in BTHS and form relationships with your teachers, you will have an amazing time.', 'Brick Township High School offers many AP classes, some of which have great teachers that teach beyond the text book. However, the school is filthy and underfunded, resulting in mold and detoriating infrastructure that students and staff dread.', 'My experience at brick high school was anything other than ordinary. Its amazing diversity allowed for me to forget that i was in America it brought me a whole new outlook on life. I am thankful to have attended brick high school for 4 glamorous years and I thank my parents for making me go here.', 'Being a senior at Brick Township High School, I can admit that these past four years have transpired much more rapidly than I ever could have imagined.  Between the typical Friday night football games, fair share of homecoming dances, and too many sports/club events to count, my experience here has been memorable to say the least. Academically, I would like to say that I am prepared to become a college student. Although there is not much parent involvement, cleanliness on school base, or the greatest food, every other aspect was at the very least average. I have made friendships I will carry throughout the rest of my life and inseparable bonds with teachers I could never forget. Overall, Brick Township High School has been a relatively good experience for me.', 'I am excited to graduate from this school, not only because I will be entering a new stage of my life, but also because I will not have to submerse myself in this unhealthy environment any longer. I have been given a great deal of stress, physical afflictions, and heartbreak from BTHS. Yes, it has made me stronger as an all-around person, but anyone should be able to gain strength in a much more morally correct manner.', "I like the BTHS because the teachers are amazing, and what I hope that change from high school is that they could stop the people's who take drugs to school.", 'Brick township high school is a wonderful school with very friendly and outgoing staff. The staff always works to help each and every student succeed. The students are accepting to all other classmates. There are many activities and sports that are offered to the students. This school is a friendly and easy to fit in environment.', 'The best way to do well in this school is to jump into AP classes which will give you good teachers and opportunities. I dislike block scheduling which often restricted what classes I could take.', 'My experience in Brick Township High School was a very interesting one. I seemed to learn way more things outside of school than from the actual lessons. I bonded with almost every single one of my teachers in my four years and consider them very important people in my life, almost like friends or family. The only change I wish to see is more in depth lessons on African American culture and the truth on Christopher Columbus and the Native Americans.', "Our school is okay. It doesn't excel with it's purpose in the least, but it gets us a high school diploma and that is what is necessary. The sports are glorified and the arts are looked down on, so there are issues, but it is an average school.", 'I️ met many teachers and people who I️ know I️ can trust and help me through situations. I️ didn’t likehow it’s a public school and they locked bathrooms for no reason.', "Graduated here a decade ago. While I had a great experience and now have a successful career, the school does very little to aid the students in pursuing excellence. The physical building and resources have not been renovated since the school's inception 6 decades ago. Lack of a proper budget is a strain on the school's staffing, extracurriculars, and", 'As a school everyone is one big family through the worst or the better no matter the time of day or the school year.', 'This school is fine, not good, not too bad, just fine. The people are unfriendly but the teachers/academics are pretty good, as long as you take honors or AP classes.']

The people are unfriendly but the teachers/academics are pretty good, as long as you take honors or AP classes.']
column6: ["This school is hot and cold for the most part. Most teachers really care about students and engage us, but a lot of them truly do not care. The school itself seems to be falling apart. Everytime it rains, the ceiling comes apart and rooms get flooded. During the summer, some rooms are unbearably hot and the gyms seem to have little to no ventilation. During the winter, its the same thing only in reverse. Some kids are nice, decent human beings, but a good portion of kids are bullies, involved with drinking, drugs, and partying. The school almost seems corrupt too. A lot of money goes to football and sometimes its not theirs to take. The members of the team also walk around acting like they own the school because its like they do. If they get themselves in trouble, the problem seems to disappear without reprimand. The councilors here are a joke. There're a few who are actually helpful and get you on the right path. Others, not so much. I wish I could say more positives than negatives.", 'My experience at Brick Township High School was average. There are some gems of teachers sprinkled about the faculty, however the guidance department is a train wreck. Many classes are easier than they should be/are expected to be.', 'I like that the teachers and Administration really care about their students! Administration makes sure they know You and they have an open door policy! It is a school that has values in learning.  If I can change one thing I would their Athletics program over the last two years it is has begun to lose what it means to play in high school and is losing our traditions', "Brick Township High School, not being the cleanest school I've been to, sure has been one of the most friendly.  Coming here everyone is smiling and helping eachother.  Teachers here truely want what is best for you and offer advise whenever they can.", 'The school is a good environment to meet new people because of the kindness there is through out the whole school. Students usually try to help each other with work when one is struggling and lift each other up when we need a little encouragement. There are teachers in the school that are also close with students and genuinely want to see those students become something great in life and encourage them to get out and travel to experience new things and new ways of life. Overall the school does pretty well with student involvement and encouraging students to get out there and better themselves.', 'I loved attending this school! The students and the teachers worked very well together. I would suggest trying to better the lunch. Though I have graduated in 2014, things may have improved. Overall I keep in contact with my teachers and they are a pleasure to see.', "Brick Township High School has offered me the opportunity to express myself as much as possible. The staff at this high school cares more about it's students than any other school I could ever imagine. We are pushed to do our best in both academics and sports and nobody ever gives up on you. The staff members believe that we all have the potential to succeed in all that we do in the upcoming future.", 'The classes had excellent teachers and I really enjoyed the classes that were offered. The administration had a very minimal understanding of what was really going on with the school and most importantly the students. The amount of fights and students that should have been expelled was ridiculously high however the amount of students that graduated with honors was also high.', 'Some of my favorite experiences were the football games but other than that no one rarely participated.', 'For the most part teachers here are not bad, but they are not the best. I myself had only a handful of good teachers that actually look like they want to be there and their main goal is to have the student succeed not fail. I have seen more than several teachers go after students just so they would fail or want to make things harder for them, not to push them to their limits so they can have a taste of the real world, but to see them struggle and feel superior. I am in college now for only two weeks and I can already feel that the majority of the teachers I have had here did not prepare me for college what so ever.', 'There is almost no security and overtime they try, it ends up being a joke.', "They'e alright, but they could be better.", "I have had some incredible teachers and met some of my best friends here, but the school is falling apart and the education isn't challenging at all. There is nothing special about this place.", 'The teachers at Brick Township High School are a mixed bag. Some of them are absolutely amazing, while others could not possibly be more uninteresting, unhelpful, and unfair.', 'My most favorite experience has to be the football game in which we verse our rival school, Brick Memorial High School. That specific game brings the student body of Brick Township High School together. We show our school spirit by going full out in our school colors and screaming to the top of our lungs. They say that before you graduate, as a student you must at least go to one of our Brick vs. Brick football games. The color white overflowing the bleachers and field, everyone screaming around you, and the players  out on the field giving all they got to show what it means to be a Brick Dragon has to be my favorite experience at my school.', 'The teachers go above and beyond for the students that want to strive in their academics. They offer one on one time with students if needed during class time, lunch, and afterschool. They are flexible with their schedules to ensure that a student is receiving as much help as she/he needs.', "There's sports to participate in and language clubs.", "What made this school unique is how we all came together at sporting events, such as football. I personally wouldn't attend this school again. The track & field program I was involved in & the coaches didn't have any knowledge of the sport what so ever. Many teachers didn't care about getting you were you needed to be to pass the class.", "Some teachers could be your best friend & some wouldn't give you the time of day to go over something you didn't understand.", 'Even though the front door is locked, all the other doors around the building were unlocked most of the time.']

I have seen more than several teachers go after students just so they would fail or want to make things harder for them, not to push them to their limits so they can have a taste of the real world, but to see them struggle and feel superior. I am in college now for only two weeks and I can already feel that the majority of the teachers I have had here did not prepare me for college what so ever.', 'There is almost no security and overtime they try, it ends up being a joke.', "They'e alright, but they could be better.", "I have had some incredible teachers and met some of my best friends here, but the school is falling apart and the education isn't challenging at all. There is nothing special about this place.", 'The teachers at Brick Township High School are a mixed bag. Some of them are absolutely amazing, while others could not possibly be more uninteresting, unhelpful, and unfair.', 'My most favorite experience has to be the football game in which we verse our rival school, Brick Memorial High School. That specific game brings the student body of Brick Township High School together. We show our school spirit by going full out in our school colors and screaming to the top of our lungs. They say that before you graduate, as a student you must at least go to one of our Brick vs. Brick football games. The color white overflowing the bleachers and field, everyone screaming around you, and the players  out on the field giving all they got to show what it means to be a Brick Dragon has to be my favorite experience at my school.', 'The teachers go above and beyond for the students that want to strive in their academics. They offer one on one time with students if needed during class time, lunch, and afterschool. They are flexible with their schedules to ensure that a student is receiving as much help as she/he needs.', "There's sports to participate in and language clubs.", "What made this school unique is how we all came together at sporting events, such as football. I personally wouldn't attend this school again. The track & field program I was involved in & the coaches didn't have any knowledge of the sport what so ever. Many teachers didn't care about getting you were you needed to be to pass the class.", "Some teachers could be your best friend & some wouldn't give you the time of day to go over something you didn't understand.", 'Even though the front door is locked, all the other doors around the building were unlocked most of the time.']

column1: International High School at Prospect Heights
column2: ['My experience was good I had a great time and everyone accepted you with your culture they make you feel welcome', 'I have been in this school no longer than 2 years. It is a international school with students from different countries and continents. I like the diversity that we experienced, it is really good have the advantage to interact with different people and be able to learn about their culture, language and thoughts. The only thing that I would change is the safety and the food that is provided to the students.', "I'm Dieulens Victor a Junior in IHSPH i've been there since 2016; from my experience I think they doing a good job basically,for Students who make it here,from across the world and they offer a lot of opportunities and activities that help you adapted very quickly. As we can see, IHSPH is one of the school in New York City that gives access to volontious people who care about their education and want to have a career.", "I like how the teacher managed to encourage the students learning in groups. There are a lot of diversity and multiligualism so I think it's help our community interacting to each other a little bit more.", 'I have visited the school recently and it has changed so much but the culture of the school is most improved overall. Glad to see the wonderful changes since I graduated from there.', 'Teachers are extremely caring and helpful. They genuinely care about their students. School feels like one big family, because everyone cares about everyone.', 'The most outstanding high school of NYC. The support students recieve is really unique and meaningful for all of us no matter our race, religion, sex, gender or disabilities, you will have the opportunity to contribute your knowledge, express your feelings, ideas or point of views with respectfully listeners. The support and helpful interactions that students have with each other makes this high school makes it the best.', "I have been 3 years in that  school now. I like that the school is diverse and everyone respect other people home language, culture and religion. All students work together as one to inprove the school.I feel like my school is my second home. I wouldn't change nothing but somethingbu I'll add is the ap classes and the way  some teachers they teach us.", 'They care deeply forthwith students and support them whenever they can', 'There are a lot of security and police around the school to keep it safe. Also, no matter what, you must show your ID to get into the building.', 'There are many different clubs, where teachers are available at any time to help.', "Most of the students are Immigrants and Teachers are very helpful. There are plenty of clubs, and organization gives you the opportunity to find yourself. In fact, chances to meet prestigious people like Barack Obama and Michelle Obama. You will get to hear many different stories from students from many different backgrounds, which makes this school very interesting. Language is the dominant in this school, you will find 20-25 different languages that are spoken by students. Overall, it's a great school, if you are a newcomer in this country. I had the best experience of my life.", 'They tend to get annoying sometimes but they do their job good.', 'you always get the help you need!', 'The environment is friendly, it was like a second home to me.', "I had the best 4 years of my life in high school. I have learned to enjoy every journeys and every steps I took through each level, I saw myself growing stronger and competitive. I was and I am proud of myself for graduating from this school and meeting lots of wonderful friends. However, when I came to know about applying for college and deciding on what to study in the future. I was a bit disappointed because I didn't had much knowledge about college until I got to my Junior-senior year and it was very intense suddenly because of the density of classes level and also the process of apply for college wasn't easy, So, I would love if my high school let the students prepare from the begging of freshmen year and open more opportunities related to college and career readiness.", 'It is alright could get better', 'My teachers make the class fun', 'There is not problems at all', 'We have the best curriculum in English class']

column6: ['Sometimes is not fair to students', 'There is a great variety of activities to choose from', 'They are always there when needed.', "There aren't many type of sports in our school. But we practice them one by one.", "The food that we receive is okay. The portions of food is not enough for per person. But, It's better to have than nothing.", "Our school has it's own policies like other schools. One of the weird rules are wearing hats in school is not allowed. Another is no cell phones and other electronics are not allowed in school. most students are disagree with these rules.", 'We have many extracurricular activities such us french club, Arabic club, music club, science club, math club, movie club, subtend government, National honor society, etc; They all tries to make our school perfect.', 'All the academics are offered in special way. Teachers uses best ways and examples of teaching it. Things seems hard to understand but if you learn from the beginning the rest is easy.', "when I came to International high school at prospect heights, I wasn't able to speak and understand English. teachers were very helpful, confident, and polite. I have taken after school classes to get some more help. Students were open and friendly. Teachers were helped me a lot. Now after four years I'm prepared for the real world. I am ready to graduate. I am really thankful to the United States by giving me that free opportunity.", 'In my school there are people that are here to help you go through your problem and they are also ready to help you.', 'The best thing about this school is the diversity. When you are in this school you might feel like you are traveling the world while you are in one place', 'The teachers at my schools are very helpful and caring. They treat the students with respect. They treat us the way they would treat their children. They have big expectations for us. They also believe in us.', 'The cafeteria in my school is clean, The place that they provide the food is clean, and also the person who is providing the food wear all the element that is needed in order to protect the food.', 'I think this school prepared me a lot. I learned lots; of new different thing at that school. I learn how to speak how to write and how to talk in English. It was hard but it was fun ay the same time.', "It's great because it used to happen few years ago but now, they set rules and that help the students behave properly. Therefore the school is a safe place.", 'We have 4 required classes : Math, English, Science,Social studies. In addiction, we have electives such as Music, Art, Gym, English elective, Regents prep class, numeracy, literacy. Student need too choose two from the list to take.', "It's very good but the only thing we don't have is the track. We don't run around the field, only jog.", "They give pizza every day and it doesn't taste good. We need some more variety of food option in the school.\r Somethimes I think It's because it's a free food.", "We have a great school policy. For example the attendance is very important. The teacher want the students to come on time, so if they don't they have to get a late pass at the main office. The staff and principal and very familir with the students and know their names. It makes us feel safe in the school.", 'We have a lot of extracurriculars opportunities such as student government, African club, chess club, peer tutoring center, etc.. Most student are part of the student govenment where they want some changes in the school. Some of their complain have been answered which are the food system and the better water fountains.']

column1: Mather Building Arts & Craftsmanship High School
column2: ['i like how can work with my hands a lot it is a small school so the students get lots of attention and if a student needs help with something, they can go to the teacher after school or lunch to get the help', "The staff at Mather are very friendly and helpful. Many of the teachers had open tutoring time when different students, no matter what grade, could come in for help. All you had to do was build a relationship and show up. While the focus was on craftsmanship, it was more of another field to explore. They encouraged us to look at our options and helped us investigate our interests. The only thing I wish was different is how communication works. Although the students are allowed to talk about how they feel at town hall or off-line, sometimes it feels like certain matters aren't open for discussion. At times it felt like answers weren't being properly given. Don't get me wrong, they try and do a good job, but there's always room for improvement. They're a new school and they are open to change, with a calm, proper argument.", "Mather highschool was an experience. They are a CTE based school so each year you're taught something different in the trades. Starting with historic preservation, then landscape and decorative finishing, then carpentry and masonry. You get a taste of all the different trades and branches you can go into. Ending senior year, everyone takes a NOCTI exam, if you pass you get a CTE endorsement. The school has amazing connections with some colleges, and National parks. The students may not be amazing and there are a few questionable teachers but the school overall is pretty average in general. I just hope that the school gets more students willing to do good in school, succeed and respect others along with staff members, also administration should allow themselves to take criticism even if it's from one student. It may seem like only one student has a problem with how something is being done, but in reality there's plenty of others who just won't say it.", 'Honestly this is School is a great school, the teachers there truly enjoys their job and wish for the best for their students. They work together with each other, the students and their parents to consistently find ways to improve the way their teaching and or to figure out what methods need to be implemented to improve the students performance either it be peer/adult tutoring, one on one sit down with the teachers themselves,  or practice online with khan academy etc. not only that but this school also highly prepares there students for the outside world when their ready to pursue their careers, with internships either provide by at the school or outside of it.       Not only that but they also provide college and AP courses  through their connections, for their students, to get them at least one step ahead in college. They also plan out creative events and trips to reward the students on their hard work and to encourage them to maintain their steady progress to success.', 'This school is focused on the trades, which are important for those that are looking for hands-on activities involving lumber, electric and manual tools, and paint. This school has several partnerships such as with the National Parks. Nonetheless, this school is not the one for those that are intrigued in STEM-related career. You will still need to do extra work outside of classroom to be a level with other students in the city. This is school has limited amount of AP or high-level classes, which are a disadvantage to those that aspire to go to college. In short, this school will fit better to those that have an aspiration to work in agriculture, landscape, preservation, and/or architecture.', 'The overall atmosphere In the school is really inviting. the teachers really care for the students as if they were a second pair of parents away from home. And while the school lunch is or can be unpleasing to the eye the school makes up for by having parties, about a party every month with food and chips etc. the campus combine all of the sports so instead of the teams being individual from each school in the building there all just one big team instead. That being said the building contains about five different school amongst its seven floors. with a school for elementary students comprising the second and third floor and a Mather being manning on the fourth floor but having about 4 classes on the sixth floor. the teachers can be really annoying but they all have you best interest at heart, and can sometimes drive you crazy with deadlines.', "Stephen t mather is an excellent highschool, they're coporated with the national parks. They have great college readiness programs and they focus on 5 core values. Responsibility, action-oriented, collaboration, consciousness, and aware.", 'Mather Building Arts & Craftsmanship High School is an excellent school. Its full of rich school culture, caring teachers, and relatable/challenging curriculum. Teachers are extremely attentive and supportive and truly care for their students success; they always so the extra mile whether its staying after school hours to personally tutor students that need the extra help or spending their lunch hour doing so. Only thing id change about this school is the clubs and activities it offers, which is little to none.', 'I was a freshmen. I wasn’t there since the school first started no complaints. The teachers really care about the students. The ones that have been there from the start anyways. New ones, could give off the wrong vibe and make you think twice if they’re there for the paycheck or because they do love teaching.', "The experience at Mather high school is great the teachers are very caring and would help you will challenging work. The staff are always there to help with any issues and help find solutions. There's diversity in the staff so everyone feels welcome and can relate to the students.", "Going to any Manhattan public school is excellent and has great education. Having gone to Mather High School the academic is average I must say, since we mainly follow the common core curriculum at this school  I feel as if it's making the learning much more complicated than what it needs to be. Although the teachers of this school is its best highlight. All teachers and the  school overall have such a passionate way of teaching something new every day and giving the help students need. Many teachers stayed after hours and during school hours if students needed extra help."]

["My experience here was great over the four years of attending  MHV. I felt as though I was apart of a family that was dedicated to helping me realize my potential. I was able to learn and grow over the years and experienced many opportunities ie. joining the debate team and attending club trips, being apart of the community service association, helping those most in need, attending. It was here that I began my first employment , working at the school's main office. Here I gain vital skills such as answering phone calls and being able to assist the caller, printing and making copies for teachers, maintaining a clean office environment and much more. I really grew as a person and as a student here. The teachers were always there to help their students and participated in fun activities.", "it is my year in this school but i am a senior and it has been a great experience. This school has many opportunities like the kinds of Advance placements classes you can take. One class i definitely recommend is the AP Literature class, it's it's a challenging class but it's still a great one", "I like the college readiness in the school and how they interact with us students and cared about our education and well being.  The teachers have done nothing but provide me with knowledge to help me be successful in whatever career path I choose to pursue.  And the Principal Mr.o is the greatest principal i've had and role model for me in my life right now. He pushed students to another dimension in life not only with our studies but connections in life. He is one of the major reasons why i'll be great no matter whatever is put in front of me.  Last but not least the staff makes student (me) felt like we were family.", "I would consider my school as a family. The people around me make feel comfortable and safe. Im surrounded by the people who motivate me and push me to do harder. Not only my friends but my teachers and staff. My experience at this school has been good. It has changed me in many good ways. I guess one thing that I wasn't a big fan of was how strict the teachers were. They would be on top of us for uniform and cellphone policies, which I do understand. In a way this did help because it makes us look more professional and makes us realize that not everything is about a phone. We can put down our phone and interact with the people we are surrounded with and focus on what we need to do. Sadly this is my last year at Mott Hall V but the memories I made here will forever be with me.", 'What I liked about my experience is that I learned to be social with my fellow classmates. I was communicating with people more. This school provided me opportunities and resources that helped my knowledge grow more. This school provided me with a family that was always supportive.', 'I like the fact that the school is very clean and the teachers always stay after school to help their students with any issues.', "I'm a current student at Mott Hall V. What I enjoyed about Mott Hall V is that it is a clean and respectful environment. They always checked that I was on track and pushed me to do great things. I wish there were more student events and more sports for us to participate in.", "Mott Hall V is one of the best schools in the Bronx. There are rarely incidents of students getting involved in fights but there was a fire incident last year. Mott Hall is still great place to learn and it has many resources such as teachers and counselors that can help you with work or if you just want to talk. Mott Hall can be a great school but like everything it has its flaws. Several teachers and staff including the principal have favorites which means that they are less hard and less strict with those students that they often get along with. This makes it unfair for those that are new because they may not get the same amount of time or the same treatment deserved. However this doesn't stop Mott Hall from being a great school because we the students make it a great school.", 'I have been in this school since ninth grade and I’ve always received the help I needed whether that was academically or socially. I feel very comfortable speaking to teachers and telling them about my day especially because they take the time out to ask about it. I enjoy the environment and how the school looks since most school aren’t as clean and tidy. Everyone is so caring there and they try to make students feel comfortable. They have a motto to have no excuses which keeps the students going.', 'Mott Hall V is school with loving and helpful teachers. Everyone is very helpful if there is anything that you will need. The teacher hold high expectations from the students at all times. When a student mess up, they are there to help them understand how the mistakes can be fixed. There is no torrent for bullying in school.', "My experience here was great over the four years of attending the high school. I was able to learn and grow over the years and experienced many opportunities. Some of those opportunity were being apart of the community service association, helping those mostly in need, attending debate club, and being active in a volleyball sports team. It was here that I began my first employment , working at the school's main office. Here I gain vital skills such as answering phone calls and being able to assist the caller, printing and making copies for teachers, maintaining a clean office environment and much more. I really grew as a person and as a student here. The teachers were always there to help their students and participated in fun activities like teachers versus students games, etc.", 'In my school they offer many courses to prepare every students for college . They provide courses like AP English, AP psychology, AP calculus', 'The extracurricular activities in my school are just amazing because the school make sure the students participating in that activities are on track academically and also the extracurricular activities in my school can help students to earn scholarship to college', 'My favorites experience in the school was the girls soccer team. What make the school is how they make sure every students is okay in the schools basically prepare the students for class and for college too. Yes I was given the chance I will choose my school again', 'The teachers in my school are very determine, intelligent, strong, friendly and willing to help any students that needs help with something.', 'The teachers are very nice and they are to help me when I really do needed the help.', 'They are there to help when needed the help.', 'The teacher knows what they are teaching and they make sure that the students understand the things that they needed to understand.', "Well my grandparents don't have the time to make to school events.", 'The teacher knows every student very well, they can see when you are overwhelmed. They cared a lot and know when we need a little push to get the work done.']

I really grew as a person and as a student here. The teachers were always there to help their students and participated in fun activities like teachers versus students games, etc.", 'In my school they offer many courses to prepare every students for college . They provide courses like AP English, AP psychology, AP calculus', 'The extracurricular activities in my school are just amazing because the school make sure the students participating in that activities are on track academically and also the extracurricular activities in my school can help students to earn scholarship to college', 'My favorites experience in the school was the girls soccer team. What make the school is how they make sure every students is okay in the schools basically prepare the students for class and for college too. Yes I was given the chance I will choose my school again', 'The teachers in my school are very determine, intelligent, strong, friendly and willing to help any students that needs help with something.', 'The teachers are very nice and they are to help me when I really do needed the help.', 'They are there to help when needed the help.', 'The teacher knows what they are teaching and they make sure that the students understand the things that they needed to understand.', "Well my grandparents don't have the time to make to school events.", 'The teacher knows every student very well, they can see when you are overwhelmed. They cared a lot and know when we need a little push to get the work done.']

column1: Queens High School for Information, Research & Technology
column2: ['It’s honestly nothing like how you would expect. It’s one huge family including both teachers and students. People are actually willing to learn and enjoy their classes.', 'QIRT is a great school overall, great teachers, always willing to help those who are motivated and also to get those that are unmotivated to find an interest. one thing I wish though is that I hope they can get a more expansive art program and more money going to that department, because students do need a creative outlet, which can help to build character and even help in other areas', "What I admire the most about my school is the amount of diversity we have, we're a melting pot of children originating from Central American and African descent. Despite seeming so racially ambiguous, my community lacks unity. There are rifts between races due to stereotypes and problems constantly arise due to ethnic differences. Unity is necessary to succeed against odds and it is vital to my community's infallible withstanding.", 'Even though I am still in school as a Senior, it was a very great experience for me having ups and downs but always kept pushing to my limits. That school taught me alot of things I thought I could never had known.', 'This high school is a very welcoming school I’ve ever been to. Many new students who come here, love the school by their second week. You can see the happy faces on students about being in that school. Plus it feels like home with all the teachers and administrators being so helpful and caring. But what I would like for a change is more clubs for every student interest.', "The principal gets along very well with the kids , Just because this SCHOOL is located in the ghetto the staff makes sure to not make it a ghetto school , It's many hispanics and African American and Indians and Guyanese in the school very few white people . I like tHE school they have fun trips like snow tubing , lake compounce , teachers do want you to pass and succeed", 'The sports criteria of this school is generally huge. There is a football team, basketball team, soccer team, swimming team, and lastly a softball team.', 'This school was small and so they were understand each student individually and speak about situations outside of school.', 'When I was intending Queens High School for Information, Research & Technology, I was the first graduating class. At the time they may had needed more funding for clubs. However, we did go on alot of trips so the teacher/student relationship was wonderful there. Most teachers did well on keeping you focused and also helped the struggling students as well. Overall, that was a great school and I wouldnt change becoming a graduate from there.', 'I like this school because I have made new friendships and done new activities that I did not do in middle school. We have a lot of fun maybe a little to much. We should be more focused on learning and expanding our minds and the way we think and our actions.', 'The ethnicity and racial diversity is somewhat big', "They are okay, most students really don't wish to do extracurriculars", 'The school nurse would take long to see you', "Various after school clubs and sports. there's something for everyone.", 'its a good school just not for me', 'Good salad bar and sandwich options', "Most teachers make you comfortable in class make you feel as if your wanted there and that they care about you. You do however, have your few that are very by the book and make you feel as if they are just there for a job. Almost every teacher has their own way about doing certain things so there are a variety of different teaching styles and most will try to teach in a manner you learn best. The main problem kids have with most teachers is their grading policies, most teachers use these online grade calculators that do not account for the student as a person or for their participation in class making many feel as if these robotic grades aren't a true reflection of them in the classroom.", 'The school building is up to date for the most part. They recently painted the hallways orange which many people have been complaining about, but I am a fan of it. There are many resources available whether it is for tutoring for a certain class or college prep. The PTA president is very involved in the school and finding ways to get other parents more involved with the students and what is going on in the school.', 'The academics offered only include general classes no AP or honors classes are offered. The school has not always had a wide variety of electives but have been creating more and more in the recent years. Some teachers really do not care about the class they teach, so in return makes the students not care much about that class neither. For the required classes to graduate you learn the material needed to know and minimum homework is given out. Trying to fox an error on your program/schedule is almost impossible considering there is only to guidance counselors for the whole school and they are always busy. There are no grade advisers or college advisers in this school.']

column1: Middlesex County Vocational & Technical School (MCVTS) - Piscataway
column2: ['I really liked attending Piscataway Vo Tech. It is a good school for kids who want to focus on a career major. I studied culinary and it is a great program. Good teachers and administration too!', 'the clubs and the bonds that I created with friends and teachers were beyond amazing. the school lunches can be better, but most of the time, they were good. If there was more safety, then students and staff can feel much better going to school everyday.', "I like that most of the teachers actually work with you. Not only that  but whatever you don't have they provide you with. This school has changed drastically. There are more clubs and a big opportunity for you once you graduate school.", "The school offers a bad pathway for anyone wanting to proceed into a competitive field. There are no AP classes and the grades are easier to get than elementary, teachers practically give you 100's for showing no effort. Although it might seem like a very good choice for some shops, such as Automotive Technology, the rest aren't some shops require harder class material in order to succeed in college. All you need to do to stay proficient in this school is: show up, be quiet, and make an effort.  If there were AP classes and if the school decided t ostep up its game, maybe this would've been a beter experience during my years here.", 'Great School to learn new expirences. MCVTS @Piscataway prepared me with the skills I need for future career development. Staff and teachers offer great support and flexibility to assist one through rough times & prepare student for life beyond high school.', "I'm currently in my sophomore year and my experience that Piscataway Vo-Tech was pleasant. I say this because the Teachers will go out of their way to aid you in your academics even if you do not ask for it. If your Teacher sees that you can do better in class or that your failing, they make the effort to assist you.", 'Outstanding school overall and I m so glad that I got an opportunity to attend this school. What can I say about the teachers, I have all professional teachers who is serving themselves for years here and few of them went to Colombia university,New York university and so on ..I m blessed to have teachers like this in my life ..The administration department and education department r excellent staff . So many clubs and shops to work with and great experience to learn always something new. I would not have this is other school. Really appreciate to all my mentors.', 'this school rarely provides extracurricular opportunities and is very dull.', 'The school has a poor curriculum; recently added honors classes and has no ap classes provided for students.', 'Many teachers fail to control the class.', "All of the teachers are great people but they way each one teaches is completely different. Some are good and some are really bad. There's some you can go to for help and there is some that will try but there will be no use.", "We don't have many clubs or sports", "The environment is good because there are no cool kids. all the students are in the same boat. the only bad thing is that they don't fix our leaking ceilings and we don't have many challenging classes and not many sports", "Most of them are good but then there's some who aren't", 'The school nurse makes sure that your health issues are addressed.', 'There is a variety of after school activities to choose from.', 'My experience at this school so far was bad. I say this because; the students that attend this school are disrespectful, ghetto, lazy, and self confidence killers who speak with rude improper language on a daily basis.', "In my opinion Mr. Surowitch is my best teacher. Why do i say this? I say this because, Mr. Surowitch's teaching styles are both detailed and well explained. As a World History teacher, Mr. Surowitch has the communication skills and knowledge to make the subject that he teaches more enjoyable.", 'its fine, not much to offer', 'it is okay just like any other school.']

As a World History teacher, Mr. Surowitch has the communication skills and knowledge to make the subject that he teaches more enjoyable.", 'its fine, not much to offer', 'it is okay just like any other school.']
column6: ["we don't have much extracurricular activities since is a vocational school.", 'What makes this school unique is my counselor. He changed my mind and inspired me to attend to college.', 'The teachers at this school are pretty young, and good friends but when is about teaching they always go out of topic and start to talk about their personal life and childhood.', 'I am disgusted with the school right now.', 'The Student involvement is okay, not many people like to do charities to support by their class. Team performance is great the school works togethef whn it comes to sports. School spirit varies, when it comes to basketball all are involved.', 'The school is pretty safe, there are constantly cops patrolling the halls.', "Some teachers often have a difficult time keeping students under control.  Some teachers don't even teach at all. However, some do their job very well and teach very well.", "There are not many options at my school and I've heard the quality is not so great. I'm not too sure because I never eat school lunch.", "One thing that truly bothers me about my school is we have absolutely no auditorium/performance space.  Although we do not have any theatre related clubs, our graduation is held at my school.....with no auditorium.  Our library is very limited and small, I wish we had a larger variety.  The technology at my school isn't great, but it could be worse.", "I enjoy certain aspects of the school, but there are many things I wish I could improve.  I wish to run for class president next year and make the school so much more than what it currently is.  I want to add more extracurricular activities, hold more fundraisers and many more things because my school has the potential to become something great.  My school is unique because once you graduate, you receive a certification in your chosen shop.  Many people often think that Vocational Schools are meant for people that people who do not wish to go to college but I completely disagree.  I intend to become a doctor and I am gaining so much essential knowledge in my Health Technology program and once I graduate I will be a certified medical assistant and I plan on working while going to school.  I'm not completely sure what I would do if I was given the chance to do it all over again.  I transferred to my current school, which has about 600 students, from a school that had over 3,000 students.  While I do miss the many opportunities my old school offered, I was so lost in the crowd in my old school.  When I came to my current school, I was able to find myself and come out of my shell. I became the person I am today all because I transferred to this school.", 'The administration and policies at my school are improving greatly.  As time is passing, I am seeing changes that are improving the school.  The school is becoming stricter in every aspect.  Phones are now prohibited, the dress code is actually being enforced, students are getting expelled much more often (when needed of course).', 'The teachers often have a difficult time keeping students quite and under control, making it difficult for students, such as myself, who want to learn.  Some teachers do not challenge the students enough and the curriculum should be a bit more challenging.', "My school isn't very diverse, it is predominantly hispanic and black.", "Although there aren't many sports in my school, the basketball teams seem to get the most attention.  Students attend the basketball games much more than the other sports games at my school.", "There are currently not many extracurricular activities at my school.  While most schools have a variety of activities that the students can participant in, my school is very limited.  We have sports teams such as basketball, softball, baseball, and soccer.  We have a few clubs, such as HOSA, Skills USA, FBLA, and Yearbook Committee, but other than that there isn't much to participate in.", 'They try to help you a little.', 'I pretty much lived off the same foods for four years', 'I never lacked in course studies due to the absence of equipment.', 'Law enforcement was very present in our school on a regular basis. Never felt threatened nor intimated by anyone during the course of my stay here.', 'I worked for all of my high school years and therefore never had the opportunity to partake in any of its out of school events.']

column2: ["My name is Marcos De Paula, i'm 16 years old. In Manhattan Academy for Arts and Language I am a Junior , and my experience are incredible. During this three years, I've been doing a lot of activities and my academic life has increased. This high school has helped me in passing regents such as Algebra and Living Environment which are the difficult subjects that I had to faced. By the same token, I've been leader in my school, part of National Honor society and participated in the Student government. Manhattan Academy is the best school to be since their is a diversity of cultures and you learn and live the experience with many other cultures that will inspire you. This is the school of learning.", 'this is a small community with excellent teachers willing to help you all the time, most students are Hispanic but there are other races too.', 'I have been in MAAL since 2015. It has been such a great experience for me. Teachers are really helpful and kind. I feel like my teachers are more like friends. The school is small that we get to know Everyone and learn a little bit more about their culture. We share and create memories everyday.', 'It’s a great school and the fact tha you have all classes everyday makes it better because of it’s consistence in the topics and how the teacher actually care alot about their students and they look better ways to teach the students in addition teachers are super friendly and the environment is peaceful specially in the last two years.', 'My experience in this school is so great since i feel connected with my learning when i am there. Also, there i learned skills that can help me when i go to college.', 'This school offers excellent after-school programs such as Robotic Club, a lot of tutoring, yearbook, Newspaper, Music and arts etc. Our college counselor is very helpful and teach us how to do everything to get into a good college for us.', 'This school was really helpful for me. I would choose this school again because I learned a lot about life and the society. I also liked the way students treat their selves even though we came from different countries. What makes this School unique is the way of teaching, it is efficient than other schools because we use lot of technology.', 'Teachers in this school are very friendly, helpful, and are have very knowledge about the topics they teach to students. Also they use a lot of technology and communication skills to explain class better.', 'The policy are not armed nor have nothing to protect themselves.', 'There are not a lot of clubs and organizations. There is only three or four. There is not much I can say about the clubs or organizations.', "The teachers at this school are great. The teachers engaged the students into the lessons. The teachers give the students the chance to have a discussion among them. The teachers use real world examples to help the students understand more the lessons. The teachers help the students when they do not understand what's being taught. The teachers give extra time to the students after school if the students need more explaining. The teachers are awesome when teaching and very friendly.", 'In my school we have art classes and music classes \r I love been in my music class. I have been playin music for the last 3 year and half \r I just love I feel free when I start playing on my cello.', 'My school is great I love been in school and be around with all this different kind of people from all over the world. I also like the school because I resive the help I needed during class and after class. The teachers in my school will always want u to do good and be good in school .', "Most of my teachers help me after class when ever I need help they don't have to do that \r But yet they help me when u ask them. Also when I need more time to finish my work they give me the time I need to get my work done in a good quality.", "People, specially students are very welcoming, once you start you'll feel liek you have arrived home back again.. It starts in a very good hour from 8:49-3:23 it used to be from almost 9 the past years but it has changed, also its a new school and the teachers and staff are very helpful and will treat you like a family its a place where they all grow together and learn together . Would love to start all over again", 'my school is an average school i could say, there are things that are done well like providing air conditioning or having clean classrooms however i believe they could do better by spreading consciousness to the kids and telling to maintain the place clean.', "My school is very poor at sports. we barely see the baseballs games that the school team has and this is because the we actually don't have our own team , kids from our school are connected with another school and the games that they play are play far away", 'the teachers at my school have awesome teaching styles. one reason is because they try to interact with the students doing group work, presentations or educational games. i feel that their styles have helped me to become a better student and develop my ideas quicker.', 'My school is not very diverse.However the students that attempt the school are friendly because we all try to be like a family and one positive  thing that allow us to be like one is the size of the school. we have around 300 students so we all try to support each other and try to be together as a team.', "The clubs and organizations that are offer at my school are very few, I guess this is because my school is just starting and doesn't know how to create and make this clubs a wonderful experience. Yet in the ones that i have participated have provided me with a lot of fun"]
